content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day February 10, 2017 IAM Concept of the Week Authentication versus Authorization February 10, 2017 Introducing our new Concept of the Week blog series  Each week well define and explain the significance of a concept in the world of Identity and Access Management. This weeks post is short but involves two critical and related terms authentication and authorization.
